name: Chen

dialogue.text: It's such a beautiful day outside..
The AP Calculus kids are suffering..
On days like these, students like you..
Should be watching Chen Math Academy!

banter: You're nothing in the face of derivatives!
Derivatives are the essence of calculus!
correct: I bet my videos taught you how to do that.
You'd do great on my unit tests!
wrong: Go watch Chen Math Academy right now!
You did not have precision, dedication, efficiency, accuracy, or perfection.
Keep studying for that formula final!
